doc:
Charles Dorian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Dorian 0 Charles Dorian (June 27, 1891 – October 21, 1942) was an American assistant director and film actor. He appeared in 26 films between 1915 and 1920. He won an Academy Award in 1933 for Best Assistant Director. He was born in Santa Monica, California and died in 1942 in Albuquerque, New Mexico from a heart attack. Charles_Dorian ( June_27_,_1891 – October_21_,_1942 ) was an_American_assistant_director_and_film_actor . He appeared in 26_films between 1915_and_1920 . He won an_Academy_Award in 1933_for_Best_Assistant_Director . He was_born in Santa_Monica , California and died in 1942 in Albuquerque , New_Mexico from a_heart_attack .
